EmailTemplate.subject: RE: FW: NFCU_Tom Glatt_MBO Partners Agreement (1329864305.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Tom, Just wanted to check in with you, please let me know if I can facilitate the paperwork with NFCU. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. <span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"> Sara Conde Sent: Friday, February 17, 2012 9:52 AM To: 'Tom Glatt' Subject: RE: FW: NFCU_Tom Glatt_MBO Partners Agreement Hi Tom, Thanks for the update. Let me know if you think it would help if I spoke with them on the phone. I usually call to introduce MBO and address any concerns or questions that a business may have. Since this project is smaller perhaps a simple letter agreement would be easier for the client? There is less protection for all involved but it also is only one page so it may be easier to execute. I have attached an example above. Let me know what you think. Also, if they would feel more comfortable having MBO review their stand agreement that is also an option. Thanks Tom,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Tom Glatt [mailto:tglatt@glattconsulting.com]<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Sent: Thursday, February 16, 2012 9:38 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: FW: NFCU_Tom Glatt_MBO Partners Agreement Hi Sara, They apparently have some concerns about what they believe is an unusual arrangement. I have exchanged an email with Dan - he said he will work with the board at their upcoming meeting to get everything resolved. I think I need to find a better way to describe the relationship for my existing clients - it probably won't be an issue with new clients. Something to work on over the next few days. Thanks for checking in. Tom On Thu, Feb 16, 2012 at 2:06 PM, Sara Conde < <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>> wrote:Hi Tom, I haven’t heard anything yet. Do you want me to reach out via phone? If so, may I have the client number. Thanks,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: <tel:703.793.6028" target="_blank">703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Wednesday, February 15, 2012 6:19 PM To: Gary Rowe ( <mailto:growe@twcny.rr.com" target="_blank">growe@twcny.rr.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>) Cc: <mailto:tglatt@glattconsulting.com" target="_blank">tglatt@glattconsulting.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Subject: NFCU_Tom Glatt_MBO Partners Agreement Hi Gary, Hope you are doing well. I just wanted to check in on the agreement. Please let me know if you need anything from me to help facilitate the process. Feel free to reach out with any questions. Thanks,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: <tel:703.793.6028" target="_blank">703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Friday, February 10, 2012 2:53 PM To: 'Tom Glatt'; Gary E. Rowe Subject: RE: Checking In Dear Gary , On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with your firm. MBO Partners caters to two markets. Our first service is designed for <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCb1ZVtFNiy%2FuVI735nDrOaY2kr7VzDrnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D#howwehelp" target="_blank">independent consultants and small businsses who choose to plug into our MBO Services Cloud to make it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so they can stay focused on delivering on their services. The second is how we help enterprise organizations engage more efficently and safely with their contract workforce. We have also put together a short one page collateral that explains how we work and the markets we serve. Attached is the standard agreement and statement of work we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me. And, please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. Best regards, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Tom Glatt [mailto:tglatt@glattconsulting.com]<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Sent: Friday, February 10, 2012 2:02 PM To: Gary E. Rowe Cc: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Checking In Hi Mr. Rowe, I have copied Sara Conde on this email. She is with MBO Partners, a firm I have contracted with to manage client billing, service contracts, and a few other back-office functions. She will send you what you need, contract-wise and be able to answer questions related to the contract. (Sara - please send Gary Rowe, Chairman of Northern Federal Credit Union, the MBO master service agreement.) In the interim, I will send you the latest CUES salary survey data so you can see where Dan sits currently as compared to the salary target. I will also work on setting up the salary survey system online - and I assume you need a printable copy for Ms. Pennock? Tom On Thu, Feb 9, 2012 at 10:24 AM, Gary E. Rowe < <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:growe@twcny.rr.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCb1ZVtFNiy%2FuVI735nDrOaY2kr7VzDrnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D" target="_blank">growe@twcny.rr.com> wrote:Hi there: I would like to look it over first. ThanxGER From: Tom Glatt [mailto:tglatt@glattconsulting.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>] Sent: 02/09/2012 12:05 PM To: Gary E. Rowe Subject: Re: Checking In Will do! By the way, we have a new contract process tied to a new back office company we have signed up with. Do you want me to just send it along to Dan, or do you want to look at it/review it yourself? On Thu, Feb 9, 2012 at 6:22 AM, Gary E. Rowe < <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:growe@twcny.rr.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCb1ZVtFNiy%2FuVI735nDrOaY2kr7VzDrnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D" target="_blank">growe@twcny.rr.com> wrote:We absolutely do. Feel free to start working on the project at your earliest convenience. Thanx GER From: Tom Glatt [mailto:tglatt@glattconsulting.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>] Sent: 02/08/2012 11:05 PM To: <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:growe@twcny.rr.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCb1ZVtFNiy%2FuVI735nDrOaY2kr7VzDrnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D" target="_blank">growe@twcny.rr.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Subject: Checking In Greetings Gary Rowe! Just a quick note to check in and see whether you all need assistance pulling together Dan's 2011 assessment and with checking the 2012 salary survey benchmark data. Let me know when you have a sec, and if you do need assistance we will gather all the details for you in short order! Hope all is well in the great North East! Tom -- Thomas A.
